entry.title: Whatever You Want syntax for rewriting code
entry.summary:
We have color themes for our IDEs. We should have syntax themes for our tools.

Search and Replace commands could look like this.

swap($1, $2) → swap($2, $1)

swap(α, β) → swap(β, α)

swap(🐵, 🍌) → swap(🍌, 🐵)
